title: Marlon Samuels cited for the third time in his career for suspect bowling action
text: Marlon Samuels cited for the third time in his career for suspect bowling action Monday, 19 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) West Indies batsman Marlon Samuels has been reported for bowling with a suspect action for a third time in his career. The part-time spinner was cited after the first Test against Sri Lanka. West Indies allrounder Marlon Samuels has been reported for a suspect bowling action for the third time in his career, the International Cricket Council (ICC)... SuperSport 47 minutes ago - Sports • Part-time spinner cited during recent Test defeat to Sri Lanka • Samuels has previously been reported in 2008 and 2013 West Indies’ Marlon Samuels... guardian.co.uk 1 hour ago - Sports Marlon Samuels has been reported for bowling with a suspect action for a third time in his career, the International Cricket Council (ICC) said on Monday DNA 2 hours ago - Sports West Indies batsman Marlon Samuels has been reported for bowling with a suspect action for a third time in his career, theICC has said.
